question: Will everyone qualify for Pennie?
text:
Will everyone qualify for Pennie?
          
        
The same eligibility rules apply for coverage through Pennie as they did on healthcare.gov. All Pennsylvania residents who are otherwise eligible, will be able to enroll in coverage through Pennie during the 2021 Open Enrollment Period, which goes from November 1, 2020  January 15, 2021. Pennsylvania residents experiencing a qualifying life event may be able to enroll outside of Open Enrollment using a Special Enrollment Period.
